item.title: How to change the contents of the Hugo website
item.description:
This is just to remind myself the workflow necessary to modify the content of the website.

For deploying the static HTML files that are generate in public on ccaudek.github.io repository, map the repository to public as a git submodule:

git init
git submodule add git@github.com:ccaudek/ccaudek.github.io.git public
hugo #Build the project
cd public #Go To Public folder
git add -A #Add changes to git
git commit -m "your message" #Commit changes
git push origin master #Push source and build repos
